body:
Hi Dian, You should connect a number to "HB Generate Sky With Certain Illuminance level".
Underline on the left side means it should be something that you have to provide to your component. For example... [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/bCfB14IUU7JdBHnmNYNrZw9*iE2z9BWUCL0GyGQo*W5cxKufFVu4ibi6KuGPqt9k3RRrL21Eyt5zhpSnq-FoHIw4HE-ZtVSc/_I_I.png) Best Antonello
